{"id":1289258569,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â days","timestamp":1718470848,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1289258569/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"45 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        int right_sum = 0;\n        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            right_sum += nums[i];\n        }\n\n        int left_sum = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (right_sum == left_sum) {\n                return i;\n            }\n            left_sum += nums[i];\n            if (i+1 < nums.length) right_sum -= nums[i+1];\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
